price: (78) So the earthquake seized them, and they became within their home [corpses] fallen prone.
arabic: فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلرَّجۡفَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ فِي دَارِهِمۡ جَٰثِمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fa-akhadhathumu al-rajfatu fa-aṣbaḥū fī dārihim jāthimīna
